meanings.definition: To list or detail individual items.
meanings.sent1: I will itemize the groceries we need for the party.
meanings.sent2: She likes to itemize her expenses to keep track of her spending.
meanings.sent3: The detective had to itemize all the clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: The teacher asked the students to itemize their ideas before writing the essay.
meanings.sent5: In order to organize the closet, she decided to itemize all the clothes by color.

meanings.definition: To present or arrange in items.
meanings.sent1: The chef will itemize the ingredients needed for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: He had to itemize the tasks to be completed before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The magician will itemize his tricks for the audience.
meanings.sent4: The artist will itemize the colors to use in the painting.
meanings.sent5: To plan the event effectively, they will itemize the schedule hour by hour.
